post.author: 신민용
post.content:
Position: Java Team Lead
Required: This person will be a Hands-on Java Team Lead. Must have previous experience Team Leading a group of 10+ Java Developers, must have strong Development background with Java/J2EE, Weblogic, OO, and RUP. Communication skills must be excellent.
Location: Toronto, Ontario Duration: Permanent Rate/Salary:$70K Start Date: ASAP
PROCOM SERVICES A leading provider of IT services in North America, PROCOM and PROCOM SERVICES currently have more than 1700 consultants on assignment. For over 25 years, we have been finding high-quality jobs for our consultants. Our policies of maintaining open communication with both clients and consultants consistently make us the IT Firm of Choice.
We would like to thank you for your interest. Please note that all submissions will be assessed. However, only suitable candidates will be contacted further. NO PHONE CALLS PLEASE
Please submit your most recent resume to:
Jeff Vainio Technical Recruiter PROCOM JeffV@procom.ca
post.title: java Team Lead
